title: Happy Birthday, Riko-senpai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Riko-senpai, happy birthday-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Thank you, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin came to pick you up. Everyone is waiting for you over there, so let’s hurry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, if you keep spinning around like that, you’ll fall, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin won’t fall! Come on, let’s go there already! We all did our best with decorating and cooking together. Kanata-senpai made a large cake, Honoka-senpai brought a lot of sweets, and Mari-senpai’s secret hotpot-like dish is actually really delicious despite its look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What about your bread rolls, Kasumi-chan….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You know, I really love sandwiches. And you’re good at making bread rolls, right, Kasumi-chan? So I’m actually really looking forward to eating them today….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeeh!? Umm, of course Kasumin prepared some! But are you really looking forward to them that much….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I may have had high hopes for them…. Ehehe<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aaaah, Riko-senpai, love you love you! Kasumin also prepared some for you to take home, so please eat a bunch-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
